Package org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation

Class AnnotationBeanWiringInfoResolver

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.AnnotationBeanWiringInfoResolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
BeanWiringInfoResolver
public class AnnotationBeanWiringInfoResolver extends Object implements BeanWiringInfoResolver
BeanWiringInfoResolver that uses the Configurable annotation to identify which classes need autowiring. The bean name to look up will be taken from the Configurable annotation if specified; otherwise the default will be the fully-qualified name of the class being configured.
Since:
2.0
Author:
Rod Johnson, Juergen Hoeller
See Also:

    • getDefaultBeanName

      protected String getDefaultBeanName(Object beanInstance)
      Determine the default bean name for the specified bean instance.

      The default implementation returns the superclass name for a CGLIB proxy and the name of the plain bean class else.

      Parameters:
      beanInstance - the bean instance to build a default name for
      Returns:
      the default bean name to use
      See Also:
      • ClassUtils.getUserClass(Class)
